response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your organization. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand that its true worth might be subjective based on your specific needs and goals. With that in mind, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a competitive advantage while ensuring you receive a high return on investment. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 950000}
